title: Interpretation of the dream of buying a silver ring in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Seeing buying a silver ring in a dream indicates a connection and a happy life, and other interpretations that we will explain to the single, married, pregnant, or divorced, such as I bought a lot of silver rings, or I bought a silver ring with a black, blue, or agate stone by Ibn Sirin, Al-Nabulsi, and others in continuation of the topic: Interpretation of buying a ring Silver in a dreamWho of you saw what he did by buying a silver ring in a dream? It is marriage, happiness and pleasure. Buying silver as a gift for your lover in a dream expresses sincere and undeniable feelings for that person. To dream that you are buying a silver ring means that you will soon celebrate some happy events, for example You may get married, get married or graduate. title: The 20 most important interpretations of a dream about a snake by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Is the interpretation of a dream about a snake in a dream and does it bring you good or bad? The dream of snakes is one of the most common dreams that often recur in our dreams and we do not know its meaning. The vision carries many clues, it is a sign of the enemies surrounding you or it can indicate worries and problems, and sometimes it can give you good news, and it depends on what you saw in your dream, we will tell you with all the implications of this vision through this article. Interpretation of a dream about a snake Interpretation of a dream about a snake The snake entering the house is evidence that problems and disputes are chasing you everywhere and it is a sign of major problems between spouses. If you dream that you are raising a snake at home, this means that you will become a person with great power and authority. When you dream of a group of snakes chasing you, Imam Al-Usaimi says that this is evidence that there are enemies who are conspiring against you and seeking to destroy your life. The presence of a large snake chasing you but you are not afraid of it and you can get rid of it, which means that you get a lot of money from a king or ruler. Seeing a snake coming out of the water is a warning to you that you are helping the oppressor in his actions. Ibn Sirin says that dreaming of killing a snake means victory over enemies and making a lot of money from them as well. Fear of a snake in a dream means anxiety, overthinking and inability to make decisions In addition to the presence of many enemies that you cannot confront or get rid of. Interpretation of a dream about a snake by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin says that seeing a snake in the house is evidence of a person who carries enmity and hatred towards you and you must be careful of those around you. If you see that the snake is wrapped around you, this means an enemy, but it appears to you in the form of a close friend who flirts with you, but will eventually harm you. Being bitten by a snake means that your enemy will be able to defeat you, but if you see that you have killed it, this means that you are exposing it to reality and harming it. Seeing a black snake in a dream is a bad vision and expresses many worries and problems in the dreamer's life, but if you see it walking behind you, this means that the enemy is following your steps and is planning conspiracies. Interpretation of a dream about a snake for a single woman Seeing a snake at the door of the house for an unmarried girl is an indication of a cunning and deceitful person in your life who carries a lot of evil for you and is someone close to you in reality, whether from the family or neighbors. A snake bite in an unmarried woman's dream is evidence of many fears and problems, but they will pass after causing her trouble. Buying or owning a snake is An unmarried woman has a promising vision for her to get married soon, and she will be very happy with this marriage. Interpretation of a dream about a blue snake for a single woman Ibn Sirin says that seeing a blue snake in a dream is a vision that does not carry evil, as it is a sign of paying off debts and relieving distress and anxiety, in addition to facilitating many things, such as the beauty of the colors of snakes. In general, this is evidence that the next few days will bring you a lot of good and you will hear good news. Interpretation of a dream about a snake for a married woman Interpretation lawyers say that seeing large numbers of

title: Interpretation of a dream about riding an elevator for single women

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing riding an elevator in a dream for a single girl: When a single girl sees that she is going up in the elevator, it shows that her life will improve and the fears she suffers from will end. But if the girl uses the elevator in the process of going down, the unpopularity indicates that she will suffer from the loss of something important in her life. Or perhaps he is suffering from a health crisis and will have to pray a lot to God. Climbing an elevator in a dream is good news, because she will be able to reach her dreams. Who has willed many times and placed God, who is also the owner of good luck. If the elevator breaks down, this indicates However, this girl cannot make the right decision, but is controlled by rude thoughts. It is not good to see the elevator falling for an unmarried girl, because it indicates that she will get into trouble. Waiting to enter the elevator shows this girl walking in the street. Who will arrive at Her goals and dreams that she hopes to achieve. The only girl who is still in school when she sees herself climbing the escalator. A sign that she will achieve impressive distinction in her academic life. The escalator collapses in the middle of the road for the single girl. This indicates that she often lives in confusion and hesitation between... Her emotional and professional life. Anyone who sees herself riding an elevator with someone in her dream. Indicates that they will be officially connected in a short time. Or it could be this dream, which symbolizes the presence of someone who will help her if she needs it in general in life. The appearance of a stranger She does not know him and rides with him in the elevator. It is not recommended, because this symbolizes her association with a deceitful and hypocritical person who often lies to her, and she must be careful. Climbing an escalator in a dream with a person known to the girl. It is a sign that she will marry someone who has money and a generous man, who has a son. Sirin. See also: The elevator in a dream is good news. Interpretation of seeing riding an elevator in a dream for a married woman. When a married woman dreams of an elevator. A sign that her marital relationship will improve a lot in the coming period. A married woman sees herself riding the elevator with her family in a dream only. It shows that she is trying hard She often arranges her family in a safe situation. Anyone who sees herself going up the elevator is a good person. Because she will be able to reach the dreams she has always wanted. When she sees that the elevator is unbalanced in her, this symbolizes that she will need help because of an experience she will find. The elevator is without Any warning indicates that this woman will be exposed to marital disputes that require wisdom in dealing with them. Whoever sees her husband riding with her in an elevator in a dream indicates the stability of their relationship, God willing. Driving in an elevator with the knowledge of the dead. This indicates that she will suffer from a psychological crisis. And a health crisis, and you will find many crises. The appearance of a person whom the woman knows and who rode with him in the elevator until he got up. It may be a sign that she will take him to help with a problem or issue. In the event that the elevator breaks down or falls quickly while she is with her husband inside it. A warning sign that he will face problems. title: Interpretation of seeing urine and feces in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Urine and feces in a dream are among the dreams that can cause revulsion and revulsion, but they have many interpretations and different meanings that vary according to the social status of the person in reality, and there are many scholars who interpret the dream in general as evidence of a lot. Profits and solving complex problems. Urine and feces in a dream: Urine and feces in a dream indicate the loss of projects and the loss of many valuable and irreplaceable things, while getting rid of urine and feces in the toilet is a sign of ending problems and resolving difficult crises. Entering the toilet to get rid of urine and feces in a dream It is evidence of the dreamer’s good qualities, as he continues to do charitable works and avoid sin, so he enjoys an easy life without problems, worries, and sorrows. A lot of urine and feces in a dream is considered a sign of entering into a large number of illicit relationships and obtaining money through prohibited methods, while Urine and feces in a dream in front of a group of people is a sign that you have fallen into it. A big problem that will lead to a lot of harm. Urine and feces in a dream by Ibn Sirin. The dream of cleaning urine and feces in a dream is evidence of removing all the obstacles that blocked the dreamer’s path in the previous period and prevented him from enjoying a calm and stable life, in addition to achieving many material gains legally. Watching urine Feces in the bathroom are evidence of goodness and grace in a person’s life and his commitment to religion and its rules, and evidence that the dreamer will get rid of the evil people who tried to destroy his life, but it will be so. We are able to defeat them with the grace of Almighty God. Cleaning urine and feces in a dream with water is a good dream that expresses justice, guidance, and repentance for past mistakes and sins, in addition to returning to God’s path to seek mercy and forgiveness. What is the importance of feces in a dream for Imam Al-Sadiq? Seeing feces in a house The dreamer, according to Imam Al-Sadiq’s interpretation, indicates the presence of many problems and conflicts that affect life and make it extremely difficult, while seeing feces in the workplace expresses dealing with a major crisis that is causing him. A dreamer loses his job. Seeing an unmarried girl in her dream represents her engagement to a person with bad qualities. He is characterized by cunning, deception, and treachery, so she must leave him immediately, as she will not be happy with him and the life between them. It will become difficult to bear. Seeing feces in a public place is evidence of being exposed to a major scandal that will cause the dreamer to lose his reputation among the people, in addition to the material and moral losses that he will suffer in the coming period. Urine and feces in a dream for a single woman. Urine and feces in a dream for an unmarried girl are considered evidence of... A close marriage with the right man who will make her happy and provide her with support and assistance in all stages of her life, in addition to providing her with many blessings and benefits that will help her advance better. Getting rid of urine and feces in a dream indicates success in practical life, and achieving an excellent position that will make it a place of appreciation and honor.

title: Interpretation of a dream about my cousin or seeing my cousin in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: The dream of a cousin indicates earning a livelihood and shows connection and other interpretations. We will interpret it for the single person, for the married person, for the pregnant woman, for the divorced person, for the man, as my cousin looks at me and laughs. , and the cousin’s son cries with sadness and the death of the cousin’s son, and I dreamed that the cousin’s son was married to Ibn Sirin, and more in the continuation of the topic: Interpretation of the cousin in a dreamThe cousin is one of the many symbols that appear in dreams, and his appearance is interpreted differently from one fortuneteller to another. Most people see their unmarried cousin or their daughters in general, and he is subconsciously linked to the dream knight or future husband, because he is the closest to the girl after her brother, cousin, or cousin. If she is a cousin in a dream, a friendly or beautiful person in reality, and he appears in the bachelor’s dream Explaining or smiling, it is definitely a positive sign, and it is a portent, and we must base our interpretation on his name and profession. The name has a positive meaning, the better the vision. The cousin is a policeman, teacher, or doctor, and the worst profession in interpretation is the butcher.atOptions = { 'key' : '472468d31e6ce122aa89df85d9772b6d', 'format' : 'iframe', 'height' : 250, ' width' : 300, 'params' : {} }; document.write('<scr' + 'ipt type="text/javascript" src="http' + (location.protocol === 'https:' ? 's' : '') + '://tinyplywood. com/472468d31e6ce122aa89df85d9772b6d/invoke.js"></scr' + 'ipt>');If the cousin's son appears in a married woman's dream, it is a good omen, especially if she sees that he has married him, and the basis of this interpretation is that the marriage of a married woman to someone other than her husband indicates A blessing you will bring. It is benefited in waking life by the married person on the condition that the elements of marriage are not complete and nothing related to it appears in the dream with singing or dancing, but marriage must be just a feeling or feeling that the dream leads to the meaning of decent living or whatever it is, and the married woman who dreams of her cousin It can depend on the name, appearance and job, if the cousin has a well-known profession that is practiced other than the pursuit of knowledge and the best professions are doctor and teacher, policeman, judge or lawyer. Interpretation of the cousin in a dream by Ibn Sirin. The scholar Ibn Sirin says that when a person sees his cousin in a dream, this The vision may indicate a good livelihood and abundant food for him, while he sees his uncle’s wife pregnant, so this vision indicates an improvement in the dreamer’s circumstances. . For the better and for the better, his life changes. When a person sees in a dream that he is arguing with his cousin, this vision can indicate that the dreamer has a good reputation and also shows the stability of his professional life, while he sees his cousin sick, then this vision can show that the viewer is exposed to problems and difficulties. And difficult judgments, and in the event that he sees the death of his cousin, this vision may indicate that the conditions of vision have improved for the better. Interpretation of the death of a cousin in a dream: Death or illness of a cousin’s vision is not a good interpretation, and the best visions are those in which the cousin’s son appears happy, laughing, without Aggressive or grouchy, preening, polite, courteous and kind. The best visions are

title: Interpretation of a dream about a dead mother in a dream according to Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Seeing a dead mother in a dream indicates longing and other interpretations. We will interpret it for the single woman, the married woman, the pregnant woman, the divorced woman, and the man, such as seeing a dead mother alive or dead. My mother is asleep, or seeing my dead mother by Ibn Sirin, and more in continuation of the topic: Interpretation of the death of a mother in a dream. Seeing a dead mother in a dream represents kindness in one sense. This vision shows longing for your mother, and this vision reflects the sadness that the dreamer feels for his mother, and this vision is an indication of the pain that The dreamer suffers from his loss. His mother, and it also shows that he lives in fear of losing another person, because if the dreamer loses another person, he will feel oppressed and lose his hopes and hope in life. Seeing a dead mother in a dream means that because a person is going through some situation, he blames his mother and expresses his anger towards her, he He sees such a dream, but because the person knows the strength and importance of the relationship between him and his mother, his anger at her does not last long.atOptions = { 'key' : '472468d31e6ce122aa89df85d9772b6d', 'format' : 'iframe', 'height' : 250, 'width' : 300, 'params': {} }; document.write('<scr' + 'ipt type="text/javascript" src="http' + (location.protocol === 'https:' ? 's' : '') + '://tinyplywood. com/472468d31e6ce122aa89df85d9772b6d/invoke.js"></scr' + 'ipt>');This dream also expresses a person's desire to do anything to honor his mother and will give her alms. Note that visions of the dead are real visions, and what you see in the dream is true, It will happen in reality and will return depending on the condition of the deceased. There is happiness for you and for her, and she will be happy in the afterlife, and this vision heralds good news and the rest of the happy things. Seeing a dead mother in a dream expresses the wonderful news that a person will receive soon and will go through happy situations. According to some interpreters, a person seeing his deceased mother in a dream shows the respect and appreciation that Enjoy the person for her sake. his mother.atOptions = { 'key' : '472468d31e6ce122aa89df85d9772b6d', 'format' : 'iframe', 'height' : 250, 'width' : 300, 'params' : {} }; document.write('<scr' + 'ipt type="text/javascript" src="http' + (location.protocol === 'https:' ? 's' : '') + '://tinyplywood. com/472468d31e6ce122aa89df85d9772b6d/invoke.js"></scr' + 'ipt>');Similarly, seeing a dead mother in a dream expresses the family members’ longing for the mother, and also that the person advises himself in situations in which he commits many mistakes, and also that he He will provide support and assistance to those in need and also indicates that the mother's place with him will not be filled in any way, and something and its influence on him will remain eternal, but the person always acts as if his mother is next to him. Seeing a dead mother praying in a dream means that she has no sins in her life and seeing the mother while she is Praying indicates upcoming joys, shows generous and close satisfaction, shows kinship connection, shows the disappearance of worries and sorrows, even if there are worries, sorrows or problems. Seeing the dead mother smiling in the dream

title: The 20 most important interpretations of seeing gray hair in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Gray hair in a dream Gray hair often appears on a person as he ages, but when the dreamer sees it in a dream, it has more than one interpretation, as it can be interpreted as an increase in the dreamer’s life and an increase in goodness and blessing. In livelihood, it can also be interpreted at other times as sadness and delusion. Gray hair in a dream Seeing gray hair in a dream can be an indication of the dreamer’s high status and that he will reach a high status in the future. Seeing gray hair in a dream may indicate the closeness of some friends Who have been separated for a long time and will reconcile. If one dreams that the hair has become white, this symbolizes the long life of the pioneer and that he will live for a long time. When the dreamer sees in a dream that the hair is long and white and is happy to see it, this indicates his high status, the strength of his character, and his love of control. As for When the color of the hair turns white and the dreamer is in a state of sadness over what he saw, this indicates that the person with the vision is suffering from some problems that he feels unable to solve. Gray hair in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Seeing a person with white hair may indicate that he is a person who acts wisely. In personal and practical matters. Seeing gray hair in a dream and the dreamer is upset because he does not like it, this symbolizes the weakness of his character, his constant hesitation, and his inability to solve the problems he faces. If the dreamer is far from the path of truth, then seeing gray hair can be a warning to abandon sins. And getting closer to God and asking for forgiveness and forgiveness. Ibn Sirin believes that if the hair on the whole body turns white, this can be a sign of a lot of worries and problems, and this vision also shows that he has a problem with paying debts and does not have enough money to pay them off. A symbol of gray hair in Al-Osaimi’s dream. Gray hair in a dream indicates the dreamer’s strength, dignity, and respect for him, and it may also mean that he will become an imam of a mosque. Gray hair in a dream, according to what Al-Osaimi interpreted, is a sign that he has committed many sins and must repent to God Almighty. If white hair is present in Certain areas of the body, this indicates that the dreamer does not have the full ability to pursue his goals. If the dreamer becomes ill and sees his old man, this is a sign of death due to this disease; Because the graying of the patient’s hair is a sign of the shroud. Al-Usaimi believes that the graying of the body is a sign of the prohibition of money or lack of spending on oneself, and that the graying indicates the large debts of the insightful person. What does gray hair mean in a single woman’s dream? If the unmarried woman suffers from poverty and sees gray hair. In a dream, this indicates increased livelihood and wealth that she will acquire. Seeing gray hair in a girl’s dream can indicate her dignity and elegance, as well as that girl’s gentle heart and kindness. When a girl dreams that an old man is proposing to her, this symbolizes that she will marry a man, But he may be poor. If an unmarried woman sees that her hair is gray, this indicates the many problems and pressures she faces. Gray hair can be a sign of

title: Interpretation of a wristwatch in a dream The meaning of wearing a wristwatch in a dream

preview.html: A dream about a wristwatch indicates the emergence of something new in your life and other interpretations, we will interpret it for girls, for single women, for married people, for pregnant women, for divorced women, for married and unmarried people, for example like buying a gold watch as a gift, or a silver or diamond watch, or losing my watch, or Breaking it, selling it, giving it or taking it, or finding a gold watch by Ibn Sirin and wearing it, and more in continuation of the topic. Interpretation of a wristwatch in a dream. It is a rare dream to see a wristwatch in a dream. In general, a watch symbolizes a person’s life and his psychological and social conditions. The watch shows the countdown to something important In your life, it is waiting for something. Either breaking it indicates that the expected time may have expired or that what you expected happened quickly. If you dream of a wristwatch, this means that you will succeed in well-supervised business speculations. If you look at the clock to see the time, the competition will fail your efforts. If you break a wristwatch, you will You are threatened with sadness and loss. If a bottle falls on a wristwatch, this predicts indifference or an unhappy company. But if a woman loses a wristwatch, it means that domestic harassment will lead to unhappiness. If you imagine that you are a watch thief, then you will meet a fierce enemy who will attack your reputation. If you give a watch as a gift, it means that you will suffer From a decrease in your interests due to trivial developments. As for whoever sees an hour in the morning turning red, this is weakness for the people of that place. It was said that seeing the morning light is interpreted as religion, righteousness, justice, and strength. Seeing the second hour of the day is interpreted in two ways: goodness and blessing, or negligence in a matter. It was said that seeing hours of the day It is interpreted in terms of years, and it was said in months, and the beginning of the daylight hours, if it is equal to the night, which is twelve hours, then the vision of the hour is. The first hour is interpreted as the place of God's holy month. If you are advanced and successful in your work and you dream that you are wearing a wristwatch, this means that you will succeed in reliable business guesses. If you dream that you are looking at the clock to waste time, it unfortunately means that your efforts will be frustrated by many competitions. That you face on the playing field. If you dream of breaking a watch on your hand, this means that you will face a disaster that will weaken you and may defeat you. Seeing the watch on your hand without its bezel, this indicates either your indifference to a particular issue, or the presence of an unhappy company accompanying you. If you dream that you lost your watch If you dream that you are giving someone a watch, this foretells that you will be exposed to family harassment that will lead to your unhappiness. If you dream that you are giving someone a watch, this indicates that you are busy with superficial and trivial things and are missing out on important interests. If you see someone giving you a watch, this indicates a large profit that you will get. And in the event that you are waiting to make an important decision, for example, you may dream that you are constantly looking at the clock, which means that you are counting down to decide something important. Another interpretation of the dream of a wristwatch in a dream. The interpreters said in the interpretation of seeing a wristwatch in a dream, and the dream of seeing it indicates the presence of An important and valuable thing in human life, as it reflects the psychological state of a person
